attributes.action: Allow castle doctrine in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Violent crimes are becoming more common. People are breaking into properties with knifes machetes even guns. Homeowners need to be able to protect themselves without fear of punishment when a violent attack or intrusion is happening.
attributes.background: We need clear guidelines with clear rights to allow homeowners to protect themselves without punishment

rejection.details:
It is already a defence to use reasonable force to defend yourself or property:

https://www.lexisnexis.co.uk/legal/glossary/self-defence
